metadata.title: CVE-2024-25569 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RAWCodec::DecodeBytesfunctionality of Mathieu Malaterre Grassroot DICOM 3.0.23. A speciallycrafted DICOM file can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gdcm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
